title: Corel DRAW Graphics Suite X7
description:
Comprehensive graphic design software
With a new look, new tools essential and major improvement in features, CorelDRAW Graphics Suite X7 offers a world of new creative possibilities. We design several new areas of work that reflect your natural workflow, so that everything is always exactly where you need, when they need it Be to create graphics and layouts, editing photos or develop sites, this complete suite helps graphic design software you develop your way.

Easy to use and install
From concept to production, CorelDRAW Graphics Suite X7 helps you work with style. Get started immediately with the new option Quick Start. Moreover, with thousands of high quality images, fonts, templates, clipart, and fills included, you create beautiful designs for print and for the Web quickly.

Work faster and more efficiently
With the new fully customizable and redesigned interface, you choose the desktop based on your skill level, so everything is tailored exactly to your needs. You can also set the appearance of your desktop as to resemble Adobe Photoshop or Illustrator, making an easy transition for former users of Creative Suite.

Name: CorelDRAW Graphics Suite X7
Version: 17.4.0.887 (86x & 64x)
Size: 1:25 GB
Platform: Windows
Language: Portuguese / English

Installation:
1. Disable the internet, antivirus, SystemCare and the like.
2. Go in the Setup folder and install the software compatible with your OS (32 or 64-bit).
3. Open the keygen as admin and do not close until the end of activation. Select the CorelDRAW X7 and generate a serial to proceed with the installation.
4. During installation, disable the option to automatically update.
5. After the installation, start CoreDraw X7. You will see the activation screen.
6. Go Another options and select Contact Corel.
7. This brings up a screen with an installation code. Enter this code in the field in the keygen, click Generate Activation Code.
8. Paste the generated activation code back in the activation screen.
9. Even if the occurrence of an invalid key message, ignore, CorelDraw is already enabled.
10. Go in the Update folder and run the executable to install the latest hotfix.
11. Enable the Internet

Requirements:
- Microsoft Windows 8 / 8.1 (32-bit or 64-bit editions), Windows 7 (32-bit editions or 64-bit) with the latest service packs installed
- Intel Core 2 Duo or AMD Athlon 64
- 2 GB of RAM
- 1 GB of hard disk space (for installation without content)
- Mouse, tablet or multitouch screen
- 1280 x 768 resolution of screen- DVD drive (required for installation of the box)
- Microsoft Internet Explorer 8 or later
- Internet connection required for association and signature services, installing updates and access to some features, including content switching, QR code tools and ConceptShare
